data.title: Port of Vancouver
data.meta_description: Award-winning cruise terminal and homeport for Alaska-bound sailings.
data.text:
The Port of Vancouver serves a variety of cruise lines sailing out of the award-winning Vancouver is the only homeport with both one-way and round-trip itineraries through Canadaâ€™s Inside Passage.

Cruise schedule

The cruise schedule is updated regularly and is subject to change at any time.

For questions about boarding, disembarkation, and health and safety guidelines, please contact your travel agent or cruise line directly.

Celebrity Cruises Hurtigruten Regent Seven Seas Crystal Cruises Norwegian Cruise Lines Royal Caribbean Cunard Cruise Line NYK Cruises Seabourn Disney Cruise Line Oceania Cruises Silversea Cruises Explora Journeys Peace Boat Victoria Cruises Hapag-Lloyd Cruises Ponant Viking Ocean Cruises Holland America Line Princess Cruises
